data.name: PinWithNotEnoughDigitsLettersSigns
data.value: At least {0} letters, digits or symbols must be used.

data.name: PinWithNotEnoughDigitsOrSigns
data.value: You must also use at least {0} digits or symbols.

data.name: PinWithNotEnoughLettersOrDigits
data.value: You must also use at least {0} letters or digits.

data.name: PinWithNotEnoughLettersOrSigns
data.value: You must also use at least {0} letters or symbols.

data.name: PinWithTooManyIdenticalSymbols
data.value: A PIN must not contain more than {0} identical symbols.

data.name: PinWithTooManySequencedSymbols
data.value: A PIN must not contain more than {0} sequenced symbols, e.g. "12" or "ab".

data.name: YourLegalIdentityHasBeenCompromised
data.value: Your legal identity has been marked as compromised. You have therefore been redirected to create a new account.

data.name: YourLegalIdentityHasBeenObsoleted
data.value: Your legal identity has been marked obsolete. You have therefore been redirected to create a new account.

data.name: ClientMessageAuthenticationTimeout
data.value: Response not returned within configured time.

data.name: ClientMessageReferenceMismatch
data.value: Returned reference did not match request reference.

data.name: ClientMessageUnexpectedDocumentInformation
data.value: Document information not returned as expected.

data.name: ClientMessageUnexpectedEventResult
data.value: Event result not returned as expected.

data.name: RepairRestart
data.value: An inconsistency in the internal database has been detected. This can happen if the app is not closed properly. The app will therefore close. The next time you start the app, the database will be repaired.

data.name: InvitedToCreateAccountOnDomain
data.value: You have been invited to create an account on {0}. Press OK, and enter the name of the account you wish to create.

data.name: ThisCodeCannotBeClaimedAtThisTime
data.value: This code represents a Tag ID invitation, and cannot be claimed at this time.

data.name: DomainDoesNotFollowEncryptionPolicy
data.value: {0} does not follow the ubiquitous encryption policy

data.name: OperatorDoesNotSupportRegisteringNewAccounts
data.value: The operator {0} does not support registration of new accounts

data.name: AccountNameAlreadyTaken
data.value: Account name {0} is already taken. Choose another.

data.name: AppNotConnected
data.value: App is not connected to the network.

data.name: PetitionToViewContractWasDenied
data.value: Petition to view contract was denied.

data.name: PetitionToViewLegalIdentityWasDenied
data.value: Petition to view legal identity was denied.

data.name: APetitionHasBeenSentToTheContract
data.value: A petition has been sent to the parts of the contract. If any of the parts accepts the petition, the contract information will be displayed on the screen.

data.name: APetitionHasBeenSentToTheOwner
data.value: A petition has been sent to the owner of the identity. If the owner accepts the petition, the identity information will be displayed on the screen.

data.name: APetitionHasBeenSentToYourPeer
data.value: A petition has been sent to your peer

data.name: APeerReviewYouhaveRequestedHasBeenAccepted
data.value: A peer review you requested has been accepted.

data.name: APeerYouRequestedToReviewHasBeenRejectedDueToSignatureError
data.value: A peer review you requested has been rejected, due to a signature error.

data.name: APeerYouRequestedToReviewHasRejected
data.value: A peer you requested to review your application, has rejected to approve it.

data.name: UnableToGetAccessToYourPrivateKeys
data.value: The application was unable to get access to the private keys of the identity. This typically means the identity has been changed outside of the scope of the app. It can also be a result of a corruption of data. You can try one of two things. Press the Continue button, to continue, without the private keys. You get access to the app, but cannot sign anything. You can then choose to reapply for a new identity from the main menu, with new private keys. You can also try to repair the database, by pressing the Repair button. In the latter case, the app is closed, and the next time the app is opened, a repair-procedure is first attempted.

data.name: IdCopiedSuccessfully
data.value: A link to the ID was copied to the clipboard.

data.name: PleaseReviewAndCheckAllCheckboxes
data.value: Please review all information above, and check the corresponding check boxes if the information is correct. This must be done before you can approve the information.

data.name: YouNeedToCheckCarefullyReviewed
data.value: You need to check the box you have carefully reviewed all corresponding information above.

data.name: YouNeedToApproveToAssociate
data.value: You need to approve to associate your personal information with the identity you review. When third parties review the information in the identity, they will have access to the identity of the reviewers, for transparency.

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToRemoveContact
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this contact from your list of contacts?

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToReportYourLegalIdentityAsCompromized
data.value: Are you sure you want to report your legal identity as compromised, stolen or hacked?

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToRevokeYourLegalIdentity
data.value: Are you sure you want to revoke your legal identity from the application?

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToTransferYourLegalIdentity
data.value: Are you sure you want to transfer your legal identity from the application to another? The identity will be removed from this device once completed. Also make sure no-one else can see your screen during the process.

data.name: FileUploadServiceNotFound
data.value: No file upload service found on broker.

data.name: LegalServiceNotFound
data.value: No legal service found on broker.

data.name: OnboardingPurposePageDetails
data.value: Choose in what context you intend to use the Neuro-Access

data.name: OnboardingPhonePageDetails
data.value: To get verified, you need to enter your phone number

data.name: OnboardingEmailPageDetails
data.value: We’ll send you a verification code

data.name: OnboardingVerifyCodePageDetails
data.value: Please enter verification code sent to {0}

data.name: OnboardingAccountPageDetails
data.value: Enter the name you want to use for your account

data.name: OnboardingDefinePinPageDetails
data.value: To enhance the security of your Neuro-Identity and sensitive information, we recommend adding an extra layer of protection by creating a PIN or password

data.name: PurposeEducationalDescription
data.value: This option allows you to use Tag ID for educational purposes. You can use the app to sign or access resources as a private person, either as an educator, or as a student. The account may be limited in time. The account may also be removed when no longer used. Check with the service provider for more information.

data.name: PurposeExperimentalDescription
data.value: This option allows you to use Tag ID for experimental purposes. You can use the app to sign or access resources as a private person, with the goal of learning the technology and for what purposes it can be used. The account may be limited in time. The account may also be removed when no longer used. Check with the service provider for more information.

data.name: PurposePersonalDescription
data.value: This option allows you to use Tag ID for personal purposes. You can use the app to sign or access resources as a private person. Certain operations may incur costs, depending on the service provider you choose. Check with the service provider for more information.

data.name: PurposeWorkDescription
data.value: This option allows you to use Tag ID for work purposes. This includes work not for profit in organizations. You can use the app to sign or access resources as a representative of an organization. Certain operations may incur costs, depending on the service provider you choose. Check with the service provider for more information.

data.name: NetworkSeemsToBeMissing
data.value: Network seems to be missing. Please check your configuration and coverage and try again.

data.name: SendEmailWarning
data.value: A code has been sent in an e-mail message to your e-mail adderss. If you don't receive it, please also check your spam folder.

data.name: SwitchingToTestPhoneNumberNotAllowed
data.value: Changing the phone number to a test one is not allowed.

data.name: SomethingWentWrongWhenSendingEmailCode
data.value: Something went wrong when sending a verification code to this email.

data.name: SomethingWentWrongWhenSendingPhoneCode
data.value: Something went wrong when sending a verification code to this phone number.

data.name: QrSectionTitle
data.value: Point the camera at the QR-code with the following symbol

data.name: AccountAvailableAlternatives
data.value: The following names are still available:

data.name: TestOtpUsed
data.value: A temporary OTP code has been used. The application will stop working in about a week. You'll have to reinstall the application to use it again.

data.name: PetitionSignatureInformationText
data.value: A request for your signature has been received. Review the reason below, and the information about who sent the request, and then choose how you wish to respond.

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToReportYourLegalIdentityAsCompromized1
data.value: Are you sure you want to report your legal identity as compromised, stolen or hacked?

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToRevokeYourLegalIdentity1
data.value: Are you sure you want to revoke your legal identity from the application?

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToTransferYourLegalIdentity1
data.value: Are you sure you want to transfer your legal identity from the application to another? The identity will be removed from this device once completed. Also make sure no-one else can see your screen during the process.

data.name: ChangePinDescription
data.value: Choose another PIN-code to identify yourself. Changing your PIN-code will also create a new random password for the underlying communication network.

data.name: ReportAsCompromizedDescription
data.value: Report if App, PIN or phone has been compromised, hacked or stolen.

data.name: RestartNeededDueToThemeChange
data.value: A restart of the App is needed, for the new theme to be properly displayed. When closing the dialog, the App will automatically close. When restarting the App, the new theme will be selected.

data.name: RevokeIdentityDescription
data.value: Revoke the current identity from the App, and apply for a new one.
